abstract: Gary M. Reiner, former chief information officer for General Electric, and James S. Turley, former chairman and chief executive of the accounting firm Ernst & Young, will join an expanded board.
snippet: Gary M. Reiner, former chief information officer for General Electric, and James S. Turley, former chairman and chief executive of the accounting firm Ernst & Young, will join an expanded board.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup has expanded its board, announcing the additions of two new directors.
